description: What would you like to know about the clashes in Ukraine and the political crisis that has gripped the country for the past three months?
title: Ask a Question About the Crisis in Ukraine
title_page: Ask a Question About the Crisis in Ukraine - The New York Times
text:
What questions do you have on the clashes in Ukraine and the political crisis that has gripped the country for the past three months? Leave your questions in the comments of this article. David M. Herszenhorn, a Moscow-based correspondent for The New York Times who has been covering the political unrest in Ukraine since it began in November, will answer them Friday.
Mr. Herszenhorn answered a selection of readers' questions on the situation in Ukraine.
